name: Bagel Shop
description: Welcome to The Bagel Shop! Search our inventory to see if your favorite bagels are in stock. http://problems.getpwning.com:7007/ [Source: {{url_for("search.php")}}]
hints: What information does the search give you?
If you use the `LIKE` operator, remember that the character '_' means a single-character wildcard. You'll have to escape it with '\_'.
author: zaratec
